Class zebkit.data.SingleLineTxt
extends <zebkit.data.TextModel> 		<zebkit.data>

Single line text model implementation

Constructor:
zebkit.data.SingleLineTxt ([s], [max])

Parameters:
  • [s] <String>

    the specified text the model has to be filled

  • [max] <Integer>

    the specified maximal text length



  • Methods
  • Attributes
  • Events

public <String> getLine (line) Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public <Integer> getLines ( ) Override zebkit.data.TextModel
public <Integer> getTextLength ( ) Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public <String> getValue ( ) Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public void remove (offset, size) Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public void setMaxLength (max)
public void setValue (text) Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public <Boolean> validate (text)
public void write (s, offset) Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel

@Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public <String> getLine (line)

Get the given string line stored in the model


Parameters:
  • line <Integer>

    a line number


Returns: <String>

a string line
@Override zebkit.data.TextModel
public <Integer> getLines ( )

Get number of lines stored in the text model. The model can have only one line


Returns: <Integer>

a number of lines
@Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public <Integer> getTextLength ( )

Get number of characters stored in the model


Returns: <Integer>

a number of characters
@Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public <String> getValue ( )

Get wrapped by the text model original text string


Returns: <String>

an original text
@Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public void remove (offset, size)

Remove substring from the text model.


Parameters:
  • offset <Integer>

    an offset starting from that a substring will be removed

  • size <Integer>

    a size of a substring to be removed
public void setMaxLength (max)

Set the given maximal length the text can have


Parameters:
  • max <Integer>

    a maximal length of text
@Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public void setValue (text)

Fill the text model with the given text


Parameters:
  • text <String>

    a new text to be set for the text model
public <Boolean> validate (text)

Validate the given text. This method can be implemented to prevent inserting text in text model that doesn't satisfy the given condition. For instance text can allow only numeric.


Parameters:
  • text <String>

    a text


Returns: <Boolean>

return true if the text is valid otherwise return false
@Implemented in zebkit.data.TextModel
public void write (s, offset)

Write the given string in the text model starting from the specified offset


Parameters:
  • s <String>

    a string to be written into the text model

  • offset <Integer>

    an offset starting from that the passed string has to be written into the text model

public <Integer> maxLen

Maximal text length. -1 means the text is not restricted regarding its length.
  • textUpdated ( src , b , off , len , startLine , lines , )

textUpdated /* Extended from zebkit.data.TextModel */</em>

Fired when the text model has been updated: a string has been inserted or removed

       text.on(function (src, b, off, len, startLine, lines) {
           ...
       });

Parameters:
  • src <zebkit.data.Text>

    a text model that triggers the event

  • b <Boolean>

    a flag that is true if a string has been written in the text model, false if the model substring has been removed

  • off <Integer>

    an offset starting form that the text update took place

  • len <Integer>

    a length of text that has been affected by the text model update

  • startLine <Integer>

    a first line that has been affected by the text model update

  • lines <Integer>

    a number of lines that has been affected by the text model update
